name: Reika Akuzawa
aboutMe: I am a Web Developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites, leveraging a robust background in team assistance within international companies. My experience has honed my ability to multitask effectively and organize tasks efficiently. I am now seeking a position where I can apply my diverse skills and extensive background to contribute to the growth of the company.

descriptions: Spearheaded the development of a Laravel-based web application for internal use, optimizing the sorting of bank transaction data and invoices, resulting in significant time and workload reduction.
Contributed as a key developer in a website renewal project, collaborating with clients to meet their technical goals and ensure project success.
I actively contributed to the optimization and development of several React and Vue projects, enhancing their functionality and performance.
I supported 6 HR specialists as a secretary by managing schedules, creating documents, organizing hiring processes, and coordinating departmental events with over 50 participants.

In international fashion company, I was responsible for communicating with over 100 stores regarding in-house created marketing materials, managing schedules for these materials, translating from English to Japanese, and collaborating with the creative team in the USA regarding marketing materials.
I specialize in sorting diamonds and designing accessories. Additionally, I purchase accessories for my own online shop.
